abstract: John C. Malone’s Liberty Media is poised on the brink of a majority stake in DirecTV after boosting its recently acquired interest in the satellite TV giant from 41 percent to 48 percent.
lead_paragraph: John C. Malone’s Liberty Media is poised on the brink of a majority stake in DirecTV after boosting its recently acquired interest in the satellite TV giant from 41 percent to 48 percent.
